content: find kits here 1 the kiss shawl by melissa clulow is designed with sonder yarn co muse 2 a soft ever so slightly rustic blend of merino and linen this unique combination of fibres creates a subtle heathered effect which brings depth and dimension to the knitted fabric simple and modern the kiss shawl is worked in stockinette from the top-down in graphic stripes and finished off with a striped garter stitch border a lovely uncomplicated project for easy warm-weather knitting 1 https //sonderyarnco com/collections/kits 2 https //sonderyarnco com/products/muse-1 variant=42720118702325
